title: Lean UX Audit
description: A lightweight checklist to pressure-test early assumptions and reveal missing evidence.
whenToUse: Before investing in primary research to surface blind spots.
steps: List the top 5 assumptions behind the product concept.
Score each assumption by evidence quality.
Highlight the 2 assumptions with the least evidence.
Draft next-step research to validate them quickly.

title: Research Signal Map
description: Template for capturing interviews, desk research, and market signals in one view.
whenToUse: During early discovery to consolidate evidence across sources.
steps: Group evidence by user goal or pain.
Tag each signal by confidence level.
Summarize patterns that repeat across sources.
Identify the top 3 insights to carry forward.

title: Competitive Snapshot
description: A one-page view of key competitors, differentiators, and gaps.
whenToUse: When you need a fast landscape view to refine positioning.
steps: List their primary audience and proof points.
Note gaps your product can address.

title: Assumption Mapping Canvas
description: Identify high-risk assumptions and prioritize validation experiments.
whenToUse: After discovery to decide what to validate first.

title: Metric Alignment Brief
description: Align stakeholders on activation, retention, and value metrics.
whenToUse: Before executing experiments so success criteria are explicit.

title: Interview Guide
description: A structured guide for user interviews focused on problem validation.
whenToUse: When preparing to validate problem hypotheses with users.
steps: Explore current workflows and pain points.
Probe on alternatives and willingness to switch.

title: Recruiting Screener
description: Short screener to qualify participants for validation interviews.
whenToUse: Before scheduling interviews to ensure fit.

title: Synthesis Board
description: Organize findings into themes, opportunities, and next-step decisions.
whenToUse: After interviews to connect themes and prioritize action.
steps: Label each cluster with a headline.
